title: WWDC 2018: Everything Apple announced that actually matters
description: ![]()But wait, there’s more. Apple is talking about some the technologiesunderlying its software products, starting with Metal, which is Apple’s nativegraphics….thing.That’s pretty much the ‘General Interest’ portion of tonight’s keynote donewith, it seems. No [iPhone SE 2,](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/iphone-se-2-release-date-2018-3339886) as some had predicted, but plenty worthtalking about on the software front!## WWDC 2018 Live Stream: How to re-watch the Apple WWDC keynoteMiss the Apple WWDC 2018 live stream? Fear not, Apple has already uploaded itsWWDC keynote to the Apple Events website for your catch-up viewing pleasure.It’s hosted on the Apple Events [website](https://www.apple.com/apple-events/june-2018/) so getting up-to-speed really couldn’t be easier!**Share your WWDC 2018 reactions with us on Facebook or Twitter@TrustedReviews.**
